properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , MEM_BIRTH , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE (STATUS = 'Y' OR STATUS = 'A') AND MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT MEM_NAME , PHONE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND PHONE = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , MEM_BIRTH , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'A' AND MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , MEM_BIRTH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = MEM_ID WHERE MEM_NO = ?
